進む: (susumu) - avançar, progredir; preceder, ir à frente (de); fazer progresso, melhorar; aprofundar, intensificar
進める: (すすめる) - to advance; to promote; to hasten
進め方: (すすめかた) - format; procedure; way of proceeding
進んで: (すすんで) - voluntarily; willingly; of one's own free will
進出: (しんしゅつ) - advance (into a new market or stage of progress); launching (a new career or venture); expanding (into a new market); stepping forward; emerging
進出制限線: (しんしゅつせいげんせん) - limit of advance
進化を遂げる: (しんかをとげる) - to make progress; to develop; to evolve (method, style, etc.)
進化ゲーム理論: (しんかゲームりろん) - evolutionary game theory (EGT)
進化学的種: (しんかがくてきしゅ) - evolutionary species
進化心理学: (しんかしんりがく) - evolutionary psychology
進化生物学: (しんかせいぶつがく) - evolutionary biology
進化発生学: (しんかはっせいがく) - evolutionary developmental biology; evo-devo
進化的に安定な戦略: (しんかてきにあんていなせんりゃく) - evolutionarily stable strategy; ESS
進化論: (しんかろん) - evolutionary theory; theory of evolution
進化論的認識論: (しんかろんてきにんしきろん) - evolutionary epistemology
進化速度: (しんかそくど) - evolutionary rate; rate of evolution
進取の精神: (しんしゅのせいしん) - progressive (enterprising) spirit
進取果敢: (しんしゅかかん) - (yoji) enterprising and daring; boldly forward-looking
進呈: (しんてい) - presentation (e.g. of a gift)
進塁: (しんるい) - advance (to the next base)
進士: (しじ) - palace examination (national Chinese civil servant examination based largely on classic literature)/someone who has passed this examination; examination for promotion in the Ministry of Ceremonies (based largely on political duties and Chinese classics)/someone who has passed this examination
進奏: (しんそう) - reporting to the emperor
進学: (しんがく) - entering a higher-level school, esp. going on to university
進学塾: (しんがくじゅく) - cramschool (for boys and girls who wish to go on to the next stage of education)
進学校: (しんがくこう) - school centred on preparing students to get into university; high-level school a person has entered
進学率: (しんがくりつ) - rate of advancement to the next higher level of education
進捗状況: (しんちょくじょうきょう) - state of progress
進撃命令: (しんげきめいれい) - marching order; go-ahead
進攻: (しんこう) - attack; drive; advance; invasion
進歩: (しんぽ) - (ant: 退歩) progress; advance; improvement; development
進歩性: (しんぽせい) - inventive step; invention (with respect to prior art)
進物所: (しんもつどころ) - palace kitchen in which final preparations to the imperial family's meals (e.g. reheating) were made (Heian period); kitchen (in a noble's manor)
進行: (shinkou) - moving forward (ex.: veículo), onward movement; advance (work, procedure, etc.), advancement, progress , moving forward (e.g. vehicle), onward movement; advance (work, procedure, etc.), advancement, progress; progress (of a disease), disease progression; progression (harmonic, melodic)
進行中: (しんこうちゅう) - ongoing; in progress; afoot
進行係: (しんこうがかり) - program director; programme director; facilitator; steering committee (chair)
進行形: (しんこうけい) - progressive form; in progress (e.g. of a project)
進行役: (しんこうやく) - facilitator; programme director; steering committee (chair)
進行性: (しんこうせい) - {med} progressive (worsening disease or condition)
進行性骨化性線維異形成症: (しんこうせいこつかせいせんいいけいせいしょう) - fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva (disease of the connective tissue); FOP
進行方向: (しんこうほうこう) - direction of movement (motion); direction of travel (esp. train)
進行状況: (しんこうじょうきょう) - state of progress
進行麻痺: (しんこうまひ) - progressive paralysis (due to neurosyphilis); general paresis
進言: (しんげん) - proposal; counsel; advice (to a superior)
進講: (しんこう) - giving a lecture in the Emperor's presence; lecturing to the emperor
進路: (しんろ) - route/course; career, university choices/course (of future life)
進路変更: (しんろへんこう) - change of course; route change; direction change
進路妨害: (しんろぼうがい) - interference (esp. in horse racing)
進路相談: (しんろそうだん) - consultation on career, university, etc. choices
進軍中: (しんぐんちゅう) - on the march
進退: (しんたい) - movement; course of action; advance or retreat
進退きわまる: (しんたいきわまる) - to be at a loss; to be in a corner
進退両難: (しんたいりょうなん) - (yoji) being driven to the wall; finding oneself between the devil and the deep blue sea; finding oneself between a rock and a hard place
進退伺: (しんたいうかがい) - informal resignation; unofficial resignation
進退伺い: (しんたいうかがい) - informal resignation; unofficial resignation
進退去就: (しんたいきょしゅう) - (yoji) one's course of action; deciding what to do with oneself, whether staying in the present position or leaving it
進退問題: (しんたいもんだい) - (yoji) a question of whether or not someone should resign
進退窮まる: (しんたいきわまる) - to be at a loss; to be in a corner
進駐軍: (しんちゅうぐん) - occupying forces (esp. of the Allies in Japan after World War II)
逸す: (いっす) - to lose (a chance)/to miss (a chance); to overlook/to omit/to forget; to deviate/to depart from (the norm, etc.)
逸する: (いっする) - to lose (a chance)/to miss (a chance); to overlook/to omit/to forget; to deviate
逸らかす: (はぐらかす) - to dodge; to evade; to give the slip
逸らす: (そらす) - to turn away; to avert
逸る: (はやる) - to be in high spirits; to be impatient; to be hotblooded; to be rash; to be impetuous
